drinks.name: Martini
drinks.recipe: Mix 3 parts vodka & 1 part dry vermouth.

drinks.name: Negroni
drinks.description: A nice drink for a late night conversation.
drinks.recipe: Mix equal parts of gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth.
drinks.serve: Serve cold, either on the rocks or straight up.

drinks.name: Gin and Tonic
drinks.description: Like regular tonic, but with gin.
drinks.recipe: Mix 2 parts gin & 1 part tonic water.
drinks.serve: Serve in a tall glass over ice, garnished with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: Tom Collins
drinks.serve: over ice in a highball glass

drinks.name: Manhattan
drinks.recipe: Combine whiskey, sweet vermouth, bitters and a maraschino cherry for garnish.

snacks.name: Nachos
snacks.recipe: Cover expensive, organic tortilla chips with Cheez Whiz.
snacks.serve: Serve in a hand-thrown ceramic bowl, garnished with canned black olives

snacks.name: Hummus
snacks.description: Sure to impress your vegan friends!
snacks.serve: Place unceremoniously on the table, along with pita bread.

snacks.name: Arugula and Walnut Salad
snacks.recipe: Mix arugula, toasted walnuts, and thinly-sliced Parmesan cheese. Dress with lemon and olive oil.
snacks.serve: Place on tiny, precious little plates.

snacks.name: Angry Edamame
snacks.recipe: Mix chili power, garlic powder, sesame oil and honey with steamed edamame.
snacks.serve: Serve warm, in a small bowl.

snacks.name: Beet Pickled Deviled Eggs
snacks.recipe: Let boiled eggs sit in pickled beet juice. Follow normal deviled egg recipe.
snacks.serve: Serve chilled, on a skinny platter.
